About This Property
Spacious 4 bedroom/1.5 bath unit on the second floor in a mid-rise brick building in a lovely brick building in a great location near Egleston Square! A park right across the street. Easy access to the orange line train station and bus. 

Unit features a living room, granite kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Brand new bathroom. Beautiful walnut stained floors throughout. Coin-op laundry in the basement. On-street parking with a residential permit. 

Pet Negotiable

Available September
